Description: Racial discrimination. The original verdict included $900,000 in punitive damages that were set aside by the trial judge. The final amount includes $41,325 in legal fees. The district court judgment was affirmed by the 8th Circuit in ruling 05-2220/2429.
Private Litigation Case Title: Carter et al v. Kansas City Southern Railway Company
Info Source: https://scholar.google.com/scholar_case?case=14105959005847614239&hl=en&as_sdt=6&as_vis=1&oi=scholarr

Description: Racial discrimination. The verdict amount, which includes $446,777 in legal fees, was affirmed by the 5th Circuit in ruling No._07-30674.
Private Litigation Case Title: Abner v. Kansas City Southern Railway Company
Info Source: https://caselaw.findlaw.com/us-5th-circuit/1169310.html
